channel.title: prw on the dubious monk
channel.description: Recent content in prw on the dubious monk

item.title: tubs on tubs supercalifragilisticexpialidocius prestige 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Strathcona Science Park Course: stravalink Tubs on Tubs Supercalifragilisticexpialidocius Prestige was the race that was going to open up the 2023 ABA CX season. And it did for the Novice Men, Sport Men and Sport Women categories, but sadly, the AQHI hit 11 and the afternoon races had to be cancelled (along with the next day’s entire Velocity CX Race). But I got my race in, and it was really fun!

item.title: tubs on tubs superduper prestige 2022
item.description: I returned to cyclocross in 2022, and went back to the same race in the same park. I’m not sure if that makes this a classic or not. I’d tested this course beforehand. My house is just across the river from the “indestructible Strathcona Science Park”1 so this was where I’d been riding up and down hills and practicing my off-cambers the week before. 2 In the tech guide the organizers had released it looked like the really super-steep downhill I’d wiped out on in my practice laps back in 2019 was not part of the course, which I appreciated.
